meanings.sent1: The exophthalmoses of the patient's eye concerned the doctor.
meanings.sent2: Her exophthalmoses were a result of a medical condition.
meanings.sent3: The exophthalmoses made him look like a cartoon character.
meanings.sent4: The exophthalmoses of the owl's eyes gave it a wise appearance.
meanings.sent5: The exophthalmoses of the fish in the dark water were eerie.

meanings.definition: The condition of having bulging eyes.
meanings.sent1: The exophthalmoses of the actor added to his unique look.
meanings.sent2: She was self-conscious about her exophthalmoses.
meanings.sent3: The exophthalmoses made her the center of attention at the party.
meanings.sent4: The exophthalmoses of the frog's eyes were comical.
meanings.sent5: The exophthalmoses of the cat's eyes in the dark were startling.
